author.name: Guanyu Zhu, Wei-Ting Lin, Zhaowei Sun

entry.title: Submit Proposal
entry.content:
Today We submitted our proposal. But we still had some problems about this project.

Questions about the real-time

  • Outage mail is sent in real-time by someone?
  • If the outage is recovered right now, so what should I do for the diagnostic in this situation?
  • whatâ€™s the meaning of real-time.

This project is based on this Paper Internet Outages, the Eyewitness Accounts: Analysis of the Outages Mailing List.

entry.title: Discuss which project should we choose
entry.content: Today We discussed the projects provided by the professor. We went through all the topics and talked about every details for each project. Based on our interests, we finaly picked out topic 5 and topic 8.(Refer to Projects). Then we found our professor, and talked with her to know what these two projects do. At last, we all took the topic 8(mailing list outage) as our project topic.
